【考法 1】 adj./n. 大胆鲁莽的(人)： foolishly adventurous or bold
【例】 His daredevil stunts手腕 are sure to end in disaster someday.
【近】 audacious, brash, madcap, overbold, reckless, temerarious
【反】 circumspect, guarded, heedful, prudent, wary 小心谨慎的
【考法 2】 adj. 不考虑后果的： having or showing a lack of concern for the consequences of one’s actions
【例】 a daredevil driver who thinks that racing on city streets is a harmless game
【近】 foolhardy, irresponsible, harum-scarum
【反】 responsible 负责任的
【记】 dare胆大的+ devil鬼；胆小的叫胆小鬼，这个是胆大鬼
